author: Reuters Editorial
title: ECB's Coeure says key priority for Greece is to conclude reforms on time
text:
SOFIA (Reuters) - The European Central Bank urged Greece to conclude reforms agreed with its euro zone creditors in time to successfully exit its bailout programme in August.
FILE PHOTO: Benoit Coeure, board member of the European Central Bank (ECB), is photographed during an interview with Reuters journalists at the ECB headquarters in Frankfurt, Germany, May 17, 2017. REUTERS/Kai Pfaffenbach Concluding the last batch of reforms on time was of the “utmost priority for Greece,” ECB board member Benoit Coeure told a news conference in Sofia, the Bulgarian capital.
Reporting by Francesco Guarascio; editing by Robert-Jan Bartunek
